ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious faction imbalance (was Avoiding faction hit s in PoG when  pulling)
ygData.msgSnippet: so are you saying that you went aggro (KOS) to the giants but were able to raise faction back up that you are now able to use the giant city without any
ygData.messageBody:
so are you saying that you went aggro (KOS) to the giants but were able to
raise faction back up that you are now able to use the giant city without
any mishaps?


-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: January 25, 2001 12:26 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious faction imbalance (was Avoiding faction
hit s in PoG when pulling)


we started off allying with dwarves/dragons. now we are giant lovers. we
killed their king first of course hehe. you are right about the imbalance.
allying with dragons/dwarves has absolutely no reward loot-wise. killing
dain/yel is far better.

Shada

> On a related note since we were talking about risk/reward in Velious:
>
> I think the entire Velious faction/loot setup is all out of
> balance. Seems
> to me that allying with the giants is far and away the best
> choice.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
